writer.name: 彼得鲁·杜米特里乌 Petru Dumitriu

introduction: A bourgeois family life in Romania around the time of the Great Peasant Uprising of 1907.Abandoned by her husband, Elena and her daughter, Elvira, take refuge on her sister Eleonora's estate. At the outbreak of the uprising, Elena flees the city with box of jewelry Lascari family. Believing that her sister died, returns, after the establishment of order, but finding it on his sister in life ...Screenplay after the short story with the same title by Petru Dumitriu. Filming begins in March 1957 outside Mogoșoaia, Frumușani, Lamotești, Gălbinari, Mâineasa, Șindrilița, Lilieci, Craiova, Brăila and Bucharest; interiors on the Tomis, Kirov and Buftea plateaus. The standard copy was completed in December 1957. The film debut of the actress Tanți Cocea. The film is withdrawn from distribution and disappears from filmography in 1960, after Petru Dumitriu left the country, banning both the author and the title.
